title: Honda Motorcycle and Scooter India recalls 84 bike units to fix fuel injection system
description: The voluntary recall includes bikes manufactured between 2020 to 2022. The company has identified that due to improper setting of the programme in the PGM-FI unit, there is a possibility of the engine to stall while riding, HMSI said in a statement. However, there are no cases of any failure reported in India till date.
